meanings.definition: To cut off the head of (someone)
meanings.sent2: The guillotine beheads the condemned prisoner.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chef beheads the vegetables for the soup.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the queen strategically beheads the opponent's pieces.
meanings.sent5: The sword swiftly beheads the dragon in the legend.

meanings.definition: To remove the head or top of (something)
meanings.sent1: The gardener beheads the flowers to encourage new growth.
meanings.sent2: The storm beheads the tall trees in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The barber accidentally beheads the mannequin while practicing a new haircut.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak beheads the clouds, creating a stunning view.
meanings.sent5: The machine beheads the plastic bottles for recycling purposes.
